summary: A test suite that validates the post‑processing capabilities of the ANSYS MAPDL Python interface, checking that result extraction, stress/strain calculations, and plotting functions work correctly for static, thermal, plastic, and contact analyses.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and accuracy of engineering simulation post‑processing tools, providing confidence that users can retrieve and visualize analysis results such as stresses, strains, temperatures, and contact forces across different solver types.
